name: Readily
headline: Compliance Tools for Healthcare Organizations
description: Readily helps healthcare organizations find and close compliance gaps in hours not weeks. We do that by connecting over 100,000 pages of policies, and regulations, enabling staff to conduct research, analysis, and audits faster. This saves them hours of work, boosts readiness, and helps them avoid costly violations.
tags: industry:compliance; industry:healthcare; industry:health-insurance; industry:regtech; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Ihsaan Patel, Founder
founders.description: While studying US healthcare policy during grad school, I became excited about using machine learning to transform the way healthcare is administered. Since then, I've worked in a number of engineering roles at the intersection of healthcare and ML, most recently as the Director of ML at AKASA.

founders.name: Edward Tiong, Founder
founders.description: ML Lead of $1B healthtech startup Akasa, automating claims, denials, and coding for 475+ hospitals, and 6500+ outpatient facilities. Founding team of Microsoft AI that generated cost savings of $100M+ for Azure. I am a Fellow of the Youth Southeast Asian Leaders Initiative and Institute of Engineers. Attended Berkeley, SUTD, and MIT.

Readily automates repetitive regulatory compliance tasks, reducing administrative burdens and saving valuable staff hours for higher-impact initiatives.
Backed by

Unified 
Knowledge Base
Unified 
Knowledge Base
Unified 
Knowledge Base
Readily brings together all the documents you need to perform critical compliance work. We maintain and version control external and internal documents, so you always have reliable and up-to-date information effortlessly.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/0NvbK6aq2IQzSClvlz74uJW64.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/0NvbK6aq2IQzSClvlz74uJW64.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/0NvbK6aq2IQzSClvlz74uJW64.png)
PRODUCT
Your TeamSupercharged by AI
Your TeamSupercharged by AI
Your TeamSupercharged by AI
Your TeamSupercharged by AI
Readily simplifies manual work that’s slowing your team down. It searches, analyzes, and audits thousands of documents, boosting your team's efficiency and enabling them to focus on real compliance risks.
Readily simplifies manual work that’s slowing your team down. It searches, analyzes, and audits thousands of documents, boosting your team's efficiency and enabling them to focus on real compliance risks.
Find answers to inquiries
Find answers to inquiries
Find answers to inquiries
Readily finds trustworthy answers in seconds by connecting external regulations with internal P&Ps and contracts.

Analyze Gaps For New Regulations

Analyze Gaps For New Regulations
Readily tracks new regulations and automatically identifies impacted departments, P&Ps, and action items, helping you find and close gaps faster.

Loved by ComplianceOfficers, Teams, and Business Units
Loved by ComplianceOfficers, Teams, and Business Units
Loved by ComplianceOfficers, Teams, and Business Units
  * “It used to take me 10 hours to review an All Plan Letter, and a junior staff twice as long. This saved me hours!”
Alex R.
Manager, Regulation Affairs
  * “The tool saved staff a lot of time reviewing, copying, and edit P&Ps - a very effective augmentation to the audit prep process”
Casey H.
Compliance Officer
  * "Being able to instantly locate what I need within hundreds of pages of contract is a game-changer."
Sam D.
Supervisor, Compliance
  * "It's a really easy tool - you find things really quickly and it goes directly to the language you're looking for."
Riley S.
Specialist, Policy Implementation
  * "It's super quick - it brings up the regs I'm looking for instantly. What takes me a while to find, now takes me seconds."
Jamie T.
Director, Regulatory Affairs
  * "I was able to analyze 11 bills in just two hours -work that would have normally taken me four days. It worked incredibly well!"
Alex R.
Supervisor, Legislations

![Back Arrow](https://framerusercontent.com/images/6tTbkXggWgQCAJ4DO2QEdXXmgM.svg)![Next Arrow](https://framerusercontent.com/images/11KSGbIZoRSg4pjdnUoif6MKHI.svg)
Case Study
Case Study
Case Study
This case study showcases how our AI Compliance Assistant helped a healthcare organization streamline their regulatory processes, reducing research time by 70%. By automating gap analysis and audit preparation, the organization achieved full compliance with minimal manual intervention.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/MsZizNVE32pp2kZoI9cwg86gAPU.svg)
Leveraging AI Search to
Enhance Efficiency of Research
By consolidating over 100,000 pages of regulations, legislation, contracts, and policies, our platform reduces research time by over 90%. Professionals instantly locate the sections they need, saving hours of manual retrieval and enabling them to focus on higher-value analysis.
Research
[](https://readily.co/<https:/calendly.com/edtky/readily-demo>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/K9afxo4T8rTaQ8DIwOk6tPIUo.svg)
Analyzing Complex Regulations with AI Assistance
Analyzing Complex Regulations with AI Assistance
For gap analysis of 500+ HPMS Memos and APLs, regulatory specialist were able to cut review times by over 50%, reducing a 10-hour process to just a few hours. They were able to identify impacted policies, departments, gaps, and action items in a fraction of the usual time.
Regulations
[](https://readily.co/<https:/calendly.com/edtky/readily-demo>)

Case Study
This case study showcases how our AI Compliance Assistant helped a healthcare organization streamline their regulatory processes, reducing research time by 70%. By automating gap analysis and audit preparation, the organization achieved full compliance with minimal manual intervention.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/MsZizNVE32pp2kZoI9cwg86gAPU.svg)
Leveraging AI Search to
Enhance Efficiency of Research
By consolidating over 100,000 pages of regulations, legislation, contracts, and policies, our platform reduces research time by over 90%. Professionals instantly locate the sections they need, saving hours of manual retrieval and enabling them to focus on higher-value analysis.

Analyzing Complex Regulations with AI Assistance

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Readily**

**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** San Francisco  
**Status:** Part of Y Combinator Batch S23  
**Website:** [readily.co](https://readily.co)  

---

### Mission
Readily's mission is straightforward: provide compliance tools tailored for healthcare organizations. Their platform aims to help these organizations swiftly identify and address compliance gaps—what might take weeks can be accomplished in mere hours. With a massive library of over 100,000 pages of policies and regulations, Readily accelerates research, analysis, and audit processes, ultimately leading to significant time savings and avoidance of costly violations.

### What They Do
1. **Automate Compliance Tasks:** Readily reduces the administrative burden associated with regulatory compliance, allowing teams to focus on higher-impact initiatives.
2. **Unified Knowledge Base:** The platform consolidates essential documents, maintaining version control to ensure users always access accurate and up-to-date information.
3. **AI-Driven Efficiency:** By leveraging artificial intelligence, Readily searches and analyzes thousands of documents, improving overall team efficiency. This allows users to zero in on real compliance risks.

### Key Features
- **Quick Inquiries:** Users can swiftly retrieve answers by linking external regulations with internal policies and contracts.
- **Gap Analysis for New Regulations:** Readily tracks emerging regulations and identifies which departments and policies are affected, streamlining the gap-closing process.
- **Audit Preparation:** The platform compiles necessary supporting documents and drafts responses to audit queries, minimizing back-and-forth interactions with regulators.

### Customer Feedback
Readily has garnered positive testimonials from compliance officers and teams, praising its efficiency:
- *“It used to take me 10 hours to review an All Plan Letter; now it’s significantly faster!”* - Alex R., Manager, Regulation Affairs
- Users have reported quoting time savings of over 70% in regulatory processes and completing compliance tasks in a fraction of the usual time.

### Security and Compliance
Being built for the highly regulated healthcare sector, Readily is compliant with both HIPAA and SOC 2 standards, ensuring data security and ownership are top priorities.

In the realm of healthcare compliance, Readily isn't just another tool—it's a game-changer. For organizations bogged down by lengthy compliance processes, this platform could very well be the answer to streamlining operations and focusing on what truly matters: delivering quality patient care while staying compliant with evolving regulations.

To learn more about Readily, or to see the platform in action, you can [book a demo](https://calendly.com/edtky/readily-demo).
